Reaction: e- + NH → e- + e- + H+ + N
e- + NH2 → e- + e- + H+ + NH
e- + NH3 → e- + e- + H+ + NH2
e- + N2(X, V, E) → e- + N + N

Value: 4E-10 * (Tg/300)^0.5 * exp(-Ea/Tg + 0.3Ev/Tg) where Ea=16600 K if 0.3Ev <= Ea else 4E-10 * (Tg/300)^0.5
Recommended theoretical below 15 eV; experimental above

Reaction: e- + NH3(vi) → NH3(vi+x) + e- (vibrational excitation v1+v3)
e- + NH3 → NH2- + H (dissociative electron attachment)
